import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import axios from 'axios'; const DetailView = () => { const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('product-1'); const [watch, setWatch] = useState(null); const handleTabChange = (tabId) => { setActiveTab(tabId); }; useEffect(() => { axios.get(`http://127.0.0.1:8000/dashboard/watches/21/`) .then(response => { console.log(response.data) setWatch(response.data); console.log(watch) }) .catch(error => { console.log(error); }); }, []); return (

Watch {watch && watch.watch_name}
